title: Elon Musk offers to buy Twitter outright for $41B, days after rejecting seat on board
content:
Elon Musk has offered to buy 100% of Twitter for $54.20 a share — about $41 billion — saying the platform needs to go private to thrive and serve free speech. “My offer is my best and final offer and if it is not accepted, I would need to reconsider my position as a shareholder,” Musk wrote in a letter sent to Twitter Chairman Bret Taylor on April 13. “Twitter has extraordinary potential. I will unlock it.” I made an offer https://t.co/VvreuPMeLu — Elon Musk (@elonmusk) April 14, 2022 Musk’s bid arrived days after Twitter said he’d rejected an offer…
